ThingDef.label: mirrortail
ThingDef.description: A small, colorful freshwater fish. While edible, mirrortail are rarely eaten due to their small size and low nutrition value. Instead, mirrortails are usually sold for their unique reflective scales.

ThingDef.label: rainbow trout
ThingDef.description: Large freshwater fish that inhabits warm oases. Their large size means they provide more nutrition than most fish.
